Articles.Content:
Okay so iam writing a short scifi story about a resource war on a distant planet far far away in another galaxy (sounds familiar?) so iam asking if anybody would be interested in me actually posting it on forums and if yes (hopefully) where to post it? i think it goes between space lounge and fan art. right now it is more SWIP (slow work in progress) but here is a plot so far

There is a resource crysis on a planet wars are lead for resources. (pretty simple) the hero upon escape from one of lost battles lands on an deserted place (still no idea why) picking up a 10 year old girl called Ema Crawn (orignallybraun but.... WW2) i make it on my phone so chapters might be a little shorter...... also the book is COMPLETELY done on my android phone (suck it Iphone! ) as i said there isnt much to it ATM but i think it will be pretty cool also it helps me to practice my english (im not native En) so thanks for your time!
Thanks I work on it on weekends so I don't see it made any time soon but I will try to put more work into it
I am curious to see it. Go ahead, mate. IÃ‚Â´ll see if I can lure more people to see that occasion...
Thanks! for the support the E-book is a bit inconsistent ATM also it will enter readable state soon
